column1: SAINC4 Personal Income and Employment by Major Component
3/ Census Bureau midyear population estimate. Estimates for 2010-2019 reflect Census Bureau midyear state population estimates available as of December 2019.
* Estimates prior to 1950 are not available for Alaska and Hawaii.
Note-- All dollar estimates are in millions of current dollars (not adjusted for inflation). Calculations are performed on unrounded data.
Last updated: March 24, 2020-- new statistics for 2019; revised statistics for 2010-2018.
